description: Bring the flavours of butter chicken to your next barbecue with this nutritionally approved chicken skewer recipe. It's perfect for alfresco lunches and dinners.
name: Barbecued Butter Chicken Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium heat. Cook skewers for 3 minutes on each side or until charred and cooked through. Serve skewers with rice, carrot salad and yoghurt mixture.
